docs.snippet: The Bagger tracks down the Superbowl's elusive Oscar angle....
docs.lead_paragraph: Like a lot of Americans, the Bagger was ready for some football last night. He put a buck twenty on the Colts to cover -- the only good bet he's made all season -- ordered up a bucket of chicken and kicked back. The only problem is this Oscar blog needed feeding, so he spent time searching for the ever-elusive Oscar hook. He came up with, well, not much.
docs.abstract: The Bagger tracks down the Superbowl's elusive Oscar angle.

docs.snippet: From left, Forest Whitaker (Mark Davis/Getty Images), Djimon Hounsou (Gabriel Bouys/AFP/Getty Images), Jennifer Hudson (AP Photo/Dan Steinberg), Will Smith (AP Photo/Reed Saxon) and Eddie Murphy (Gabriel Bouys/AFP/Getty Images). At a time when a U...
docs.lead_paragraph: At a time when a United States Senator, one who thinks he should be president no less, acts surprised that a fellow senator and candidate, who happens to be black, is familiar with the rudiments of language and hygiene, it would be tough to suggest that we are living in enlightened age. Still, Newsweek asks the question, "Color Blind at Last?" in a story about the number of black nominees -- five -- in the Oscar race for actors this year.
docs.abstract: From left, Forest Whitaker (Mark Davis/Getty Images), Djimon Hounsou (Gabriel Bouys/AFP/Getty Images), Jennifer Hudson (AP Photo/Dan Steinberg), Will Smith (AP Photo/Reed Saxon) and Eddie Murphy (Gabriel Bouys/AFP/Getty Images). headline.main: A Broken Clock Finally Starts Ticking

docs.snippet: Where do Oscar Ninnies go over the weekend?...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ever wonder where those pesky Oscar bloggers go over the weekend while you get on with your life? Tom O'Neil found some of their footprints, and it ain't a pretty picture. Turns out Oscar Ninnies spend time backchannel squabbling over, gee, the Oscars.
docs.abstract: Where do Oscar Ninnies go over the weekend?

docs.snippet: Martin Scorsese accepts Best Director from DGA. (REUTERS/Mario Anzuoni) Martin Scorsese said that he was surprised that he won the Directors Guild award. That makes one of us. Even a nincompoop like the Bagger can see that it's Marty's year for be...
docs.lead_paragraph: Martin Scorsese said that he was surprised that he won the Directors Guild award. That makes one of us. Even a nincompoop like the Bagger can see that it's Marty's year for best director. But does it mean for the big 'un? Can't say, don't know, more later, right? Variety tees it up thusly.
